metadata.title: CVE-2023-5933 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions after13.7 before 16.6.6, 16.7 prior to 16.7.4, and 16.8 prior to 16.8.1.Improper input sanitization of user name allows arbitrary API PUT requests.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
